column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: After heavy rain and high winds on May 22 floods swept across the streets
column4: trees collapsed on the road and the electricity lines in the Chamkarmon and Boeung Keng Kang districts were damaged.------The Governor of Khan Chamkarmorn
column6: attended the inspection of rain flooded streets and the cutting away of trees that collapsed.------The Khan Chamkarmorn Governor led his local inspectors to monitor the flood situation at Boeung Trabek Canal and the Boeung Trabek pumping station that removes water to limit flooding. ------http://www.phnompenhreporter.com/article/80784
